SEARCH
Package polimi.ingsw.controller

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
polimi.ingsw.controller.MainController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Remote, MainControllerInterface
public class MainController extends Object implements MainControllerInterface, Serializable
MainController Class
Is the Controller of the controllers, it manages all the available games that are running GameController
Allowing players to create, join, reconnect, leave and delete games
Therefore, the MainController is unique across the app and thus implements the Singleton Pattern
See Also:
